description: SIDN files are saved to the following directory in Windows 7 and 8:
C:\​Documents and Settings\​All Users\​Application Data\​Apple Computer\​iTunes\​SC Info\​

NOTE: If you install a new version of iTunes in Windows and it will not open, you can delete the SC Info.sidn file along with the SC Info.sidd and Info.sidb files in your directory as listed above, restart your computer, and then reopen iTunes.
